Properties.ProtectedString:
--[[ Fixed by ArceusInator 1/23/2015
This seriously needs to be rewritten --]]
-- Tiny Event Manager; Add: [[Event.EventName = (event)]]; Remove: [[Disconnect("EventName",...)]] local Event = {}
-- wait until child exists; return child local function WaitForChild(parent,name) while not parent:FindFirstChild(name) do parent.ChildAdded:wait() end return parent:FindFirstChild(name) end
-- get a sibling humanoid of object; by humanoid, not by name local function GetHumanoid(object) if object and object.Parent then for i,v in pairs(object.Parent:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA"Humanoid" then return v end end end return nil end
-- get the parent character from an object; verified by GetHumanoid local function GetCharacter(object) local humanoid = GetHumanoid(object) if humanoid then return object.Parent,humanoid end return nil end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, Player) local creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Value = Player creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Parent = humanoid end
function untagHumanoid(humanoid) if humanoid ~= nil then local tag = humanoid:FindFirstChild("creator") if tag ~= nil then tag.Parent = nil end end end
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
local damage = 6 local reloadTime = 2 local jumpTime = 4 local swingTime = 4 local growSpeed = 20 local updateFrequency = 1/30
local Tool = script.Parent local Handle = WaitForChild(Tool,"Handle") local Character,Humanoid local localMouse
local defaultWidth = 1.75 local defaultHeight = 1.27 local meshScaleMultiplier = .2522 local toolGrip = nil
local holdAnim local jumpAnim local swingAnim local equipAnim
local isSwinging = false local isJumping = false local isEquiped = false
local SwooshSound = Instance.new("Sound") SwooshSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=46760716" SwooshSound.Parent = Handle SwooshSound.Volume = .8
-- if theres a character, get a body part from it local function GetBodyPart(name) local character = Character or GetCharacter(Tool) if character then local object = character:FindFirstChild(name) if object then return object end end return nil end
function setMeshLength( length ) Handle.Mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(defaultWidth, defaultWidth, length * meshScaleMultiplier) end
local damageEvent = Instance.new("BindableEvent",script)
local taggedHum = nil function doDamage(hum) if hum == Humanoid then return end tagHumanoid(hum) hum:TakeDamage(damage) wait(1) untagHumanoid(hum) end
damageEvent.Event:connect(function(hum) doDamage(hum) end)
function getMaxExtension(vector) local ray = Ray.new(Handle.Position, vector) if Tool.Parent == nil then return end local hit,Position = game.Workspace:FindPartOnRay(ray, Tool.Parent) local i = 0 while hit and hit.Parent and i < 10 do i = i + 1 hum = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if hum then --hum:TakeDamage(damage) damageEvent:Fire(hum) hit.Velocity = hit.Velocity + vector.unit * 100 end vecSoFar = (Handle.Position - Position)
if hit.CanCollide then return vecSoFar.magnitude else distance = vector.magnitude ray = Ray.new(hit.Position, vector.unit * (vector.magnitude - vecSoFar.magnitude) ) hit,Position = game.Workspace:FindPartOnRay(ray, Tool.Parent) end end return vector.magnitude end
function doJump() local bv = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") bv.velocity = Vector3.new(0,20,0) bv.maxForce = Vector3.new(10000000,10000000,10000000)
local counter = 0 local radius = 2.5 while isJumping and counter < jumpTime and Tool.Parent and Tool.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") do -- and bv and bv.Parent do
radius = radius + updateFrequency * 25 local radiusCopy = radius radius = getMaxExtension(- Handle.CFrame.lookVector.unit *radius) --other direction if radius +.01 < radiusCopy then if bv then bv.Parent = Tool.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") end else if bv then bv.Parent = nil end end getMaxExtension(Handle.CFrame.lookVector.unit *radius) --damage anything above setMeshLength(radius * 2) counter = counter + updateFrequency wait(updateFrequency) end setMeshLength(5) if bv ~= nil then bv.Parent = nil end Tool.Animate:FireAllClients('UpStaff4', 'Stop') if isEquiped then Tool.Animate:FireAllClients('HoldingStaff3', 'Play') end
isJumping = false end
function onKeyDown( key ) if key == " " then --print("jumper") if isJumping or isSwinging then return end isJumping = true SwooshSound:play() Tool.Animate:FireAllClients('HoldingStaff3', 'Stop') Tool.Animate:FireAllClients('UpStaff4', 'Play') wait(.3) doJump() end end
function onKeyUp( key ) if key == " " then isJumping = false end end
function doSwing() local counter = 0 local radius = 2.5 wait(.3) while isSwinging and counter < swingTime do-- and bv and bv.Parent do --print(radius) wait(updateFrequency) counter = counter + updateFrequency radius = radius + updateFrequency * growSpeed radius = getMaxExtension(Handle.CFrame.lookVector.unit *radius) radius = getMaxExtension(- Handle.CFrame.lookVector.unit *radius) --other direction setMeshLength(radius*2) end setMeshLength(5) Tool.Animate:FireAllClients('SwingStaff2', 'Stop') if isEquiped then Tool.Animate:FireAllClients('HoldingStaff3', 'Play') end onMouseUp() end
function onMouseDown() if not localMouse or isSwinging or isJumping or not Tool.Enabled then return end Tool.Enabled = false isSwinging = true SwooshSound:play() Tool.Animate:FireAllClients('HoldingStaff3', 'Stop') Tool.Animate:FireAllClients('SwingStaff2', 'Play') doSwing() end
function onMouseUp() if not isSwinging then return end isSwinging = false Tool.SetIcon:FireAllClients"rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" wait(reloadTime) Tool.Enabled = true Tool.SetIcon:FireAllClients"rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" end
Tool.Equipped:connect(function(Mouse) isEquiped = true localMouse = Mouse Character,Humanoid = GetCharacter(Tool) if not Character then return end
Tool.SetIcon:FireAllClients"rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" local Torso = GetBodyPart("Torso") local rightArm = GetBodyPart("Right Arm") toolGrip = rightArm.RightGrip Tool.Animate:FireAllClients('HoldingStaff3', 'Play') Tool.Animate:FireAllClients('EquipStaff', 'Play') local counter = 0 while counter < .45 do counter = counter + updateFrequency setMeshLength(counter * 10) wait(updateFrequency) end
Tool.Animate:FireAllClients('EquipStaff', 'Stop') Tool.SetIcon:FireAllClients"rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" local clicktime = 0
Event.Died = Humanoid.Died:connect(function() end)
Event.Touched = Handle.Touched:connect(function(hit) if not hit:IsDescendantOf(Character) then local humanoid = GetHumanoid(hit) if humanoid then damageEvent:Fire(humanoid) --humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) end end end)
--wait(.3) --Handle.CanCollide = true end)
Tool.MouseUp.OnServerEvent:connect(function(client) if client.Character == Tool.Parent then onMouseDown() end end)
Tool.MouseDown.OnServerEvent:connect(function(client) if client.Character == Tool.Parent then onMouseDown() end end)
Tool.Jump.OnServerEvent:connect(function(client, on) if client.Character == Tool.Parent then (on and onKeyDown or onKeyUp)(' ') end end)
Tool.Unequipped:connect(function() isEquiped = false isJumping = false isSwinging = false Tool.Enabled = true if Event.Died then Event.Died:disconnect() end if Event.Touched then Event.Touched:disconnect() end end)
